eng.sentence: I used to rule the world
Seas would rise when I gave the word

kor.meaning: 내 말 한 마디에 바다가 솟아 올랐지

eng.sentence: Now in the morning I sleep alone

kor.meaning: 이제 난 아침에 홀로 잠을 자고

eng.sentence: Sweep the streets I used to own

kor.meaning: 내가 한 때 지배했던 거리를 쓸지

eng.sentence: I used to roll the dice

kor.meaning: 난 주사위를 굴리며 도박을 하곤 했지

eng.sentence: Feel the fear in my enemies’ eyes
Listen as the crowd would sing
Now the old king is dead! Long live the king!

kor.meaning: 이제 옛 왕이 죽었다! 왕이여, 만세!

eng.sentence: One minute I held the key

kor.meaning: 한 때 난 열쇠를 쥐고 있었지만

eng.sentence: Next the walls were closed on me

kor.meaning: 다음 순간에는 사방에 벽이 나를 에워싸고 있었어

eng.sentence: And I discovered that my castles stand
Upon pillars of salt, and pillars of sand

kor.meaning: 소금 기둥, 그리고 모래 기둥 위에 서 있었다는 걸

eng.sentence: I hear Jerusalem bells are ringing
Roman Cavalry choirs are singing
Be my mirror my sword and shield

kor.meaning: 나의 거울, 나의 검, 방패가 돼 주오

eng.sentence: My missionaries in a foreign field
For some reason I can’t explain
Once you go there was never,
Never an honest word

kor.meaning: 절대로 진실된 말 따위는 없다는 걸

eng.sentence: That was when I ruled the world

kor.meaning: 그건 내가 세상을 지배했을 때의 얘기지

eng.sentence: It was the wicked and wild wind
Blew down the doors to let me in

kor.meaning: 문을 부숴버려서 내가 들어갈 수 있었지

eng.sentence: Shattered windows and the sound of drums
People couldn’t believe what I'd become

kor.meaning: 사람들은 나의 변한 모습을 믿지 못했지

eng.sentence: Revolutionaries wait
For my head on a silver plate
Just a puppet on a lonely string

kor.meaning: 한 가닥 외로운 줄에 매달린 꼭두각시일 뿐이지

eng.sentence: Oh who would ever want to be king?
I hear Jerusalem bells are ringing
Roman Cavalry choirs are singing
Be my mirror my sword and shield

kor.meaning: 나의 거울, 나의 검, 나의 방패가 돼 주오

eng.sentence: My missionaries in a foreign field
For some reason I can’t explain
I know Saint Peter won't call my name

kor.meaning: 성 베드로가 내 이름을 부르지 않을 거란 걸 알지

eng.sentence: Never an honest word

kor.meaning: 절대로 진실된 말 따위는 없다는 걸

eng.sentence: And that was when I ruled the world

kor.meaning: 그건 내가 세상을 지배했을 때의 얘기지
